languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс кладет руку на оружие и кивает на дрожащего офицера.{/n} "Я видел таких людей. Боящихся собственной тени. Более того — я сам превращал своих "подопечных" в подобных им. Его пытали".

{n}Heinrix sets his hand on his weapon and nods at the trembling officer.{/n} "I have seen people like this before. Afraid of their own shadow. More than that — I have turned my 'underlings' into this. He has been tortured."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс кладет руку на оружие и кивает на дрожащего офицера.{/n} "Я видел таких людей. Боящихся собственной тени. Более того — я сам превращал своих "подопечных" в подобных им. Его пытали".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sets his hand on his weapon and nods at the trembling officer.{/n} "I have seen people like this before. Afraid of their own shadow. More than that — I have turned my 'underlings' into this. He has been tortured."

{n}Heinrix sets his hand on his weapon and nods at the trembling officer.{/n} "I have seen people like this before. Afraid of their own shadow. More than that — I have turned my 'underlings' into this. He has been tortured."

{n}Heinrix sets his hand on his weapon and nods at the trembling officer.{/n} "I have seen people like this before. Afraid of their own shadow. More than that — I have turned my 'underlings' into this. He has been tortured."

{n}Heinrix sets his hand on his weapon and nods at the trembling officer.{/n} "I have seen people like this before. Afraid of their own shadow. More than that — I have turned my 'underlings' into this. He has been tortured."

languages.text: {n}海因里希将手搭在武器上，朝发抖的军官点了点头。{/n}“我曾见过这样的人，他们变成了惊弓之鸟。不仅如此，我还曾把我负责审讯的‘合作伙伴’变成过这个样子。这个军官应该是遭到了折磨。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sets his hand on his weapon and nods at the trembling officer.{/n} "I have seen people like this before. Afraid of their own shadow. More than that — I have turned my 'underlings' into this. He has been tortured."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希将手搭在武器上，朝发抖的军官点了点头。{/n}“我曾见过这样的人，他们变成了惊弓之鸟。不仅如此，我还曾把我负责审讯的‘合作伙伴’变成过这个样子。这个军官应该是遭到了折磨。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se lleva la mano al arma y asiente en dirección al tembloroso oficial.{/n} «He visto a gente en este estado. Tiene miedo a su propia sombra. Es más, he dejado en semejante estado a mis "subordinados". Esto es obra de tortura».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sets his hand on his weapon and nods at the trembling officer.{/n} "I have seen people like this before. Afraid of their own shadow. More than that — I have turned my 'underlings' into this. He has been tortured."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se lleva la mano al arma y asiente en dirección al tembloroso oficial.{/n} «He visto a gente en este estado. Tiene miedo a su propia sombra. Es más, he dejado en semejante estado a mis "subordinados". Esto es obra de tortura».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは武器に手をかけてから、震える士官に向けてうなずいた。{/n}「俺は以前、こういう人を見かけたことがある。己の影を恐れる者。それ以上に…俺は俺の”内なる者”をこうしてしまった。彼は酷い苦痛を受けた」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sets his hand on his weapon and nods at the trembling officer.{/n} "I have seen people like this before. Afraid of their own shadow. More than that — I have turned my 'underlings' into this. He has been tortured."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは武器に手をかけてから、震える士官に向けてうなずいた。{/n}「俺は以前、こういう人を見かけたことがある。己の影を恐れる者。それ以上に…俺は俺の”内なる者”をこうしてしまった。彼は酷い苦痛を受けた」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix pose une main sur son arme et désigne l'officier de la tête.{/n} « J'ai déjà vu des gens comme ça, qui ont peur de leur ombre. Pour être plus précis, c'est ce que j'ai fait de mes "subalternes". Il a été torturé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sets his hand on his weapon and nods at the trembling officer.{/n} "I have seen people like this before. Afraid of their own shadow. More than that — I have turned my 'underlings' into this. He has been tortured."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix pose une main sur son arme et désigne l'officier de la tête.{/n} « J'ai déjà vu des gens comme ça, qui ont peur de leur ombre. Pour être plus précis, c'est ce que j'ai fait de mes "subalternes". Il a été torturé. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix legt die Hand an die Waffe und nickt dem zitternden Offizier zu.{/n} "Ich habe solche Leute schon einmal gesehen. Sie haben vor ihrem eigenen Schatten Angst. Mehr noch — ich habe meine 'Untergebenen' in diese Wesen verwandelt. Er wurde gefoltert."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sets his hand on his weapon and nods at the trembling officer.{/n} "I have seen people like this before. Afraid of their own shadow. More than that — I have turned my 'underlings' into this. He has been tortured."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix legt die Hand an die Waffe und nickt dem zitternden Offizier zu.{/n} "Ich habe solche Leute schon einmal gesehen. Sie haben vor ihrem eigenen Schatten Angst. Mehr noch — ich habe meine 'Untergebenen' in diese Wesen verwandelt. Er wurde gefoltert."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, elini silahına götürüp titreyen subaya bakarak başını sallıyor.{/n} "Daha önce böyle insanlar gördüğüm oldu. Kendi gölgesinden korkuyor. Dahası, kendi 'ast'larımı bu hâle getirdiğim de oldu. İşkence görmüş."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sets his hand on his weapon and nods at the trembling officer.{/n} "I have seen people like this before. Afraid of their own shadow. More than that — I have turned my 'underlings' into this. He has been tortured."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix elini silahına götürüp titreyen subaya bakarak başını sallıyor.{/n} "Daha önce böyle insanlar gördüğüm oldu. Kendi gölgesinden korkuyor. Dahası, kendi 'ast'larımı da bu hâle getirdiğim oldu. İşkence görmüş."
